Class OriginatorImpl

java.lang.Object
fr.istic.aco.editor.memento.OriginatorImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Originator<EngineImpl>
@Component public class OriginatorImpl extends Object implements Originator<EngineImpl>
Implementation of the Originator interface for managing the state of an EngineImpl. This class can save the current state of the engine to a memento and restore the engine's state from a memento.

    • OriginatorImpl

      Constructs an OriginatorImpl with a new EngineImpl.

    • OriginatorImpl

      public OriginatorImpl(EngineImpl engine)
      Constructs an OriginatorImpl with the specified engine.
      Parameters:
      engine - the engine to be managed by this originator. Must not be null.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the provided engine is null.

  • Method Details

    • saveState

      public Memento<EngineImpl> saveState()
      Saves the current state of the engine to a memento. The state is deeply cloned to ensure immutability.
      Specified by:
      saveState in interface Originator<EngineImpl>
      Returns:
      a Memento containing the deep-cloned state of the engine.

    • restoreState

      public void restoreState(Memento<EngineImpl> memento)
      Restores the engine's state from the specified memento. The current buffer is cleared, and the buffer and selection are restored from the memento's state.
      Specified by:
      restoreState in interface Originator<EngineImpl>
      Parameters:
      memento - the memento containing the state to restore. Must not be null, and the memento state must not be null.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the memento or its state is null.

    • getEngine

      public EngineImpl getEngine()
      Returns the engine managed by this originator.
      Returns:
      the current EngineImpl.

    • setEngine

      public void setEngine(EngineImpl engine)
      Sets the engine to be managed by this originator.
      Parameters:
      engine - the new engine. Must not be null.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the provided engine is null.
